desc.en: Featuring multiple company credentials: a Chinese business license, a U.S. registration document, several award plaques (including a Jiangsu quality integrity honor, a consumer cooperation/charity award, and a chamber of commerce membership plaque), and two ISO-style certificates for a Quality Management System and an Environmental Management System.
desc.zh: 汇总多项企业资质与荣誉：包含中国营业执照、美国注册文件、多块奖牌（如江苏省质量诚信荣誉、消费者协作爱心奖、商会会员单位等），以及质量管理体系认证证书与环境管理体系认证证书等。

desc.en: Authorization/approval documents (including a Sedex SMETA authorization/audit-related document) and a list of certified/cooperating brand logos such as Nestlé, Ferrari, Abbott Nutrition, New Balance, FILA, BAGGU, Diplomat, and Disney. Certifications like ISO 9001 and “Sedex SMETA Certified Company.”.
desc.zh: 授权/生产证明文件（包含 Sedex SMETA 相关授权/审核文件），下方列出多家认证/合作品牌标识，如雀巢、法拉利、雅培营养、新百伦、斐乐（FILA）、BAGGU、Diplomat、迪士尼等，并强调体系认证（如 ISO9001）及 “Sedex SMETA Certified Company”
